Onboarding.title: How to Play
Onboarding.intro: Start your journey from a newbie to an IT mogul. Manage your money, status, and happiness.
Onboarding.learn_desc: Improve your skills to get better jobs.

PWAUpdate.title: System Update
PWAUpdate.message: A new version of IT Tycoon is available. Would you like to update now?

ResetModal.confirm_message: Are you sure you want to reset the game? All progress will be lost.

Shop.title: Supermarket
Shop.help_content: Here you can buy food and other items to improve your health. Each item has a different cost and health benefit.

Job.title: Job Center
Job.help_content: The Job Center is where you can find work. Manual jobs require clicking to earn money, while passive jobs provide hourly income. Most jobs have requirements like education, stamina, or computer tiers.

Entertainment.title: Entertainment
Entertainment.help_content: Keep your happiness high by participating in various activities. Higher mood is often required for certain actions and helps prevent game over.

GameOver.title: Game Over
GameOver.header_line1: A problem has been detected and IT Tycoon has been shut down to prevent damage
GameOver.health_description: Your health has reached a critical level and you can no longer continue.
GameOver.health_cause: Insufficient rest, overworking, or poor food choices
GameOver.money_description: You have run out of money and cannot afford basic necessities.
GameOver.money_cause: Insufficient income, excessive spending, or poor financial management
GameOver.mood_description: Your mood has deteriorated beyond recovery.
GameOver.mood_cause: Lack of entertainment, overwork, or stress
GameOver.default_description: An unexpected critical failure occurred in your virtual life.
GameOver.default_cause: Multiple stat failures or critical threshold breach
GameOver.cause_prefix: The problem seems to be caused by the following:
GameOver.first_time_line1: If this is the first time you've seen this Stop error screen,
GameOver.first_time_line2: restart your game. If this screen appears again, follow
GameOver.advice_money: Check to make sure you have enough money for basic needs.
GameOver.advice_stats: Maintain your health, mood, and stamina stats above critical levels.
GameOver.advice_progression: If problems continue, consider getting a better job or education.
GameOver.press_key: Press any key to restart game

Notifications.low_health: Your health is dangerously low. Visit the Supermarket!
Notifications.low_mood: You are very unhappy. Do something fun!

Rest.title: Rest & Relax
Rest.help_content: Recover your stamina by resting. Some methods are fast but costly, while others are slow but free. Watch out for cooldowns!
